meanings.sent1: The insalubrities in the old building were evident from the moldy walls and musty smell.
meanings.sent2: The insalubrities of the polluted river posed a threat to the community's health.
meanings.sent3: The insalubrities in the abandoned house made it a perfect setting for a horror movie.
meanings.sent4: The insalubrities lurking in the neglected corner of the garden were like hidden dangers waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The insalubrities of the dirty public restroom were so repulsive that no one dared to use it.

meanings.definition: The state of being harmful to health or well-being
meanings.sent1: Living in insalubrities can lead to various health problems if not addressed promptly.
meanings.sent2: The insalubrities of the contaminated food caused an outbreak of illness in the community.
meanings.sent3: The insalubrities of the situation were so absurd that it almost seemed comical.
meanings.sent4: The insalubrities of the toxic relationship were poisoning her happiness slowly.
meanings.sent5: The insalubrities of the dark alley made it a place to avoid at all costs.
